title: Smart Data Models - Traffic Environment Impact
description: Environmental Impact of traffic based on the vehicles traffic and their emission characteristics

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be TrafficEnvironmentImpact

co2.description: Property. The measured C02 emission concentration. Units:'mg/L'

dateObservedFrom.description: Property. Date of the start of measurement (timestamp) in ISO 8601

dateObservedTo.description: Property. Date of the end of measurement (timestamp) in ISO 8601

traffic.description: Property. Array of objects containing the different types of vehicles and its relations with the object of the traffic flow observations

vehicleClass.description: Property. Enumeration of the vehicle classes

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

refTrafficFlowObserved.description: Relationship. Unique identifier of the entity TrafficObserved with the averageVehicleSpeed, averageOccupancy and intensity
